biotools.summary:
Nonnegative Matrix Factorization-based Immune-TUmor MIcroenvironment Deconvolution.

R package for our Nonnegative Matrix Factorization-based Immune-TUmor MIcroenvironment Deconvolution (NITUMID), joint work with Seyoung Park (https://sites.google.com/view/seyoungpark/home).

Non-negative Matrix Factorization-based Immune-TUmor MIcroenvironment Deconvolution (NITUMID)
